explains: v. 争吵，争辩；驱拢，看管（牲口）（wrangle 的现在分词）

sentences.en: They're still wrangling over the financial details.
sentences.cn: 他们仍在为财务细节争吵。

sentences.en: The two sides have spent most of their time wrangling over procedural problems.
sentences.cn: 双方花了大部分的时间争论程序上的一些问题。

sentences.en: It is the matter they are wrangling over.
sentences.cn: 这就是他们正在争论的问题。
